Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.seam.persistence.Filter

    Serializable

    @BypassInterceptors
 @Scope(value=APPLICATION)
public class Filter
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Support for declarative application of Hibernate filters to persistence contexts.
    Author:
    Gavin King
